name: DUCKSTROMA
description:
----------
This is an early NES prototype, no story exists, just collect a single disk.
Good Luck!

INFORMATION
----------
This game comes as a .nes file, usable on the Nintendo Entertainment System. If you don't have a Nintendo Entertainment System, you can use an emulator like Mesen.

CONTROLS
----------
Joypad - Left goes left, Right goes right, Down lays an egg, A button jumps.

MISC
----------
V0.28
- Fixed missing enemies
V0.27
- Initial release (20/9/20)
    Created for Byte-Off 2020
    https://www.thenew8bitheroes.com/byteoff2020

- Duckstroma will be available in 2020/2021 for MSX/ZX Spectrum/Amiga/NES.
